7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Awn bin Abi Juhaifah that his father said:"I came to the Prophet (S.A.W) and Bilal came out and called the Adhan and he started doing like this in his Adhan, turning to his right and left

chapter.ara-name: باب كَيْفَ يَصْنَعُ الْمُؤَذِّنُ فِي أَذَانِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Should The Mu'adhdhin Do While Calling The Adhan?
